DOC.criteria: 1 ) infant 's gestational age birth le 32 week ; 2 ) infant receive enteral feeding every three hour ; 3 ) infant able medically fee orally 32 week postmenstrual age ( PMA ) ; 3 ) parent give consent infant 's participation . 1 ) unable begin oral feed 32 week PMA due gastrointestinal , craniofacial , cardiovascular , neuromuscular , and/or genetic defect ; 2 ) surgical necrotizing enterocolitis ; 3 ) need ventilator support , include nasal continuous positive airway pressure ( CPAP ) , beyond 32 week PMA .
